osvSchema.details: The User Profile Builder – Beautiful User Registration Forms, User Profiles & User Role Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wppb_toolbox_usermeta_handler function in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to expose sensitive information within user metadata.

product_data.product_name: User Profile Builder – Beautiful User Registration Forms, User Profiles & User Role Editor

description_data.value: The User Profile Builder – Beautiful User Registration Forms, User Profiles & User Role Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wppb_toolbox_usermeta_handler function in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to expose sensitive information within user metadata.

description.value: CWE-639 Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key

descriptions.value: The User Profile Builder – Beautiful User Registration Forms, User Profiles & User Role Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wppb_toolbox_usermeta_handler function in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to expose sensitive information within user metadata.

El complemento User Profile Builder – Beautiful User Registration Forms, User Profiles & User Role Editor para WordPress es vulnerable al acceso no autorizado a los datos debido a una falta de verificación de capacidad en la función wppb_toolbox_usermeta_handler en todas las versiones hasta la 3.10.7 incluida. Esto hace posible que atacantes autenticados, con acceso de nivel de colaborador y superior, expongan información confidencial dentro de los metadatos del usuario.
